title: Everything is slow
body:
I've been having issues since yesterday with League and it's client. First of all, it takes 3 minutes to load in compared to the prior 10-15 seconds. I'm not even joking, it takes around a minute to authenticate then 2 minutes to load in. Then, when I load in, the client hasn't loaded everything yet, basically looks like this: 
https://i.imgur.com/7BCGUdz.png

Does that for around half a minute to a minute, then everything loads up. When I go into a game, champ select is ridiculously slow and it sometimes doesn't let me change my runes, claiming me to be below Level 6, when I'm actually Level 35.

Then, oh boy, the in-game issues. I normally play with around 150-220ms ping, completely playable. But now, I'd be lucky if I get below 330ms. Not only that, but before when it used to spike to that ping, the animations weren't as delayed. Right now I press a button, and the screen shows all the actions 5 seconds later.

I hate this, I love playing League even though I suck, why Riot?

I even reinstalled the game to see if I could fix the issue but nope. Nothing.

replies.body: I can stream multiple HD videos at the same time on my fiber net (with no buffering), but I'm getting over 13000 ping in game, totally unplayable atm.
